protein.specific_function: Responsible for the post-transcriptional adenylation of the 3'-terminal of mRNA precursors and several small RNAs including signal recognition particle (SRP) RNA, nuclear 7SK RNA, U2 small nuclear RNA, and ribosomal 5S RNA.

reference.reference_text: Perumal K, Sinha K, Henning D, Reddy R: Purification, characterization, and cloning of the cDNA of human signal recognition particle RNA 3'-adenylating enzyme. J Biol Chem. 2001 Jun 15;276(24):21791-6. Epub 2001 Apr 3.
